mapper.select: select re_id, Outlets_Id, re_network, re_type, re_money, re_remarks, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id from lms.fi_recharge where re_id = #{reId}

select re_id, Outlets_Id, re_network, re_type, re_money, re_remarks, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id from lms.fi_recharge limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.fi_recharge(Outlets_Id, re_network, re_type, re_money, re_remarks, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id) values (#{outletsId}, #{reNetwork}, #{reType}, #{reMoney}, #{reRemarks}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness}, #{empId})

insert into lms.fi_recharge(Outlets_Id, re_network, re_type, re_money, re_remarks, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id) values
(#{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.reNetwork}, #{entity.reType}, #{entity.reMoney}, #{entity.reRemarks}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.empId})

insert into lms.fi_recharge(Outlets_Id, re_network, re_type, re_money, re_remarks, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id) values
(#{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.reNetwork}, #{entity.reType}, #{entity.reMoney}, #{entity.reRemarks}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.empId})
on duplicate key update Outlets_Id = values(Outlets_Id) , re_network = values(re_network) , re_type = values(re_type) , re_money = values(re_money) , re_remarks = values(re_remarks) , AddName = values(AddName) , ADDTIME = values(ADDTIME) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness) , Emp_Id = values(Emp_Id)
mapper.update:
update lms.fi_recharge
Outlets_Id = #{outletsId},
re_network = #{reNetwork},
re_type = #{reType},
re_money = #{reMoney},
re_remarks = #{reRemarks},
AddName = #{addname},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
Emp_Id = #{empId},
where re_id = #{reId}
